description: It's fleet week, the planes are roaring through the city, and all the Doms are hungry for cute sailors to tie up and edge - and one handsome, hung seaman falls prey to their twisted whims! First he is bound and suspended in the doorframe of the open, airy bathroom, stripped down to only his hot leather boots and given some deliciously sloppy head and tormented with a pair of hitachis until he is sweating, drooling and teetering on the edge of climax. Next our Doms strap their helpless captive in an open stall door and play with his gorgeous tight asshole while he struggles and begs for release... after another messy blowjob he finally gets to blow his massive load all over one of his captors and is left stranded and naked for his fellow shipmates to discover - if they ever do!
title: Hot Uncut Sailor is Tied Up and Edged During Fleet Week!
